Articles.Content:
I finally finished my MunBase! I named it MunBase Kalpha because the American Pack has the same rovers as Moonbase Alpha. It took me a full day and many failures. One of them was the docking port on the hitchhiker was to high so the rover couldn't dock so I had to redo that mission all over again but in the end it turned out good. I also have some kethane miners and kethane converters to the right of this picture and they are using the lazor mod to transfer from miner to converter then fuel to fuel.

I also landed on Duna today with Kartoffel V for the 2nd time. This time I brought a rover I built so the kerbals can get around faster. Later this week they will return back to kerbin in their lander without docking.
Nice, I notice you have wheels, are they for ground docking purposes, or is the base mobile?

Nice, I notice you have wheels, are they for ground docking purposes, or is the base mobile?

You can undock the rovers but the main part of the base with the solar panels stay there.
That looks really good, I'm trying to sort out a Mun base at the moment.
Hey, what mod are those rovers from? It looks like Bobcat's stuff.

Hey, what mod are those rovers from? It looks like Bobcat's stuff.

American Pack

American Pack

Knew it!
